thread.title: Ecuador’s Galapagos Islands voted most beautiful island in the worldTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Ecuador’s Galapagos Islands voted most beautiful island in the worldTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ecuador’s Galapagos Islands voted most beautiful island in the worldTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ecuador’s Galapagos Islands voted most beautiful island in the world Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Readers of the US magazine Travel Leisure have voted the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador, the most beautiful islands in the world and a tourist haven.
The subscribers of the US travel magazine acknowledged the beauty of an archipelago that boasts a rich, rare wildlife, including a species of turtle from which it got its name.
In the 21th Century, scientist Charles Darwin found the place fascinating and chose it to develop research leading to his evolutionary theory about the human origin; today it is a real paradise for divers.
On the list of the top 10 most attractive islands in the planet, Bali ranks second and Maldivas third.
The readers of Travel Leisure also placed Tasmania (Australia) in the fourth place and Santorini (Greece), fifth, Murea (in the French Polinesia), sixth, Maui and Kauai (Hawaii), seventh and eighth), the Great Barrier Reef (Australia), ninth and Malta, tenth.
